name: Grapple Cube Remastered
description:
Welcome to Grapple Cube! (Beta) All instructions in game on how to play!

WASD - Move

Space - Jump 

Left Mouse - Grapple

Editor

S - Open door

N - Save Level

M - Load Lever

Delete - Delete Blocks

Right Click - Tp to point

Backspace - Deselect

Y - Open Folder with level

P - Playtest mode on/off

Q/E-  Rotate Blocks

F - Rotate Dragging Block

Grapple Cube BETA 1.3
